title: Control of fusion by elementary abelian subgroups of rank at least 2
authors: Lizhong Wang, Xingzhong Xu, Jiping Zhang
abstract:
In this paper, we focus on the subgroups control $p$-fusion, and we improve
the Theorem B of [4] for odd prime. For odd prime, we prove that elementary
abelian subgroups of rank at least 2 can control $p$-fusion(see our Theorem B).
